ABOUT KENZIE JAMES

Kenzie James is a she/her chaotic gremlin who grew up on a steady diet of fantasy and sci-fi. They fell in love with monsters early thanks to Disney's Gargoyles and loves incorporating an adventurous vibe to all of their writing.

They currently live in Texas with their two cats Wesley and Xander along with a chaotic MacBook named Astarion.
